thread.title: Person arrested after ‘showing off’ firearm to juvenile in...

author: kirotv.com
title: Person arrested after ‘showing off’ firearm to juvenile in...
text:
One person was arrested after “showing off” his firearm to a juvenile, according to police.
The person fired 42 shots into either the ground or a tree in a wooded area of Puyallup.
PPD & other police agencies responded for a possible active shooter at 9 ST SW & SR 512. There was NO shooter but 1 subject is detained.
— Puyallup Police (@PuyallupPD) October 18, 2015 Police arrested the individual for discharging a firearm in city limits.
An investigation is still underway at the scene.
SR 512 and nearby roads were shut down during the incident but have since reopened.
